intro: Parathesis glaberrima, commonly known as the smooth parathesis, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Southeast Asia. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its ornamental value and medicinal properties, it is occasionally cultivated in horticultural settings.
